scripts.start-ui:dev: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run copy-dotenv-dev && next dev -p 3001
scripts.start-ui:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging npm run copy-dotenv-dev && next dev -p 3001
scripts.start-ui:prod: ENVIRONMENT=production npm run copy-dotenv-dev && next dev -p 3001
scripts.build-only:dev: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build
scripts.build-only:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build
scripts.build-only:prod: ENVIRONMENT=production npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build
scripts.build:development: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build && next export
scripts.build:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build && next export
scripts.build:production: ENVIRONMENT=production npm run copy-dotenv-build && next build && next export
